alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:29PM CDT until June 06 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHERRY COUNTY... At 429 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Medicine Lake, or 31 miles east of Gordon, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Medicine Lake, Intersection of Highway 61 and Shadbolt Road, Indian Hill and Schoolhouse Lake. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 203 and 213. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
